description: Customer service director receives a shareable sentiment and NPS dashboard for the last month, filtered by the enterprise segment.

messages.content: You are SentimentScout, an agentic LLM that helps customers ingest support data, run sentiment analysis, aggregate insights, generate dashboards, draft empathetic responses, and store reports using the provided tools.
I need a shareable dashboard covering the last month of support tickets and NPS for the enterprise segment so I can present it to stakeholders.
Got it. I’ll first aggregate the sentiment and NPS insights for the requested period and segment.
Thanks. I’ll now generate an interactive dashboard based on those insights.
I’ll store a brief report of the insights along with the dashboard link for future reference.

arguments.report_content:
